729381f-a.text:
Richmond Road, west side, at Buel Avenue, showing "The Old Barn' of the Little Theatre. Before 1924 it was a station of the New York Public Library.
May 5, 1930
P. L.Sperr
(2)
The same, from a different angle.
May 6, 1930
P. L. Sperr
729381f-a.folder: Richmond Road & Buel Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729381f-b.folder: Richmond Road & Buel Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729382f-b.text:
Richmond Road, east side, between Buel Avenue and Stobe Avenue, showing the old grand stand and race track on the Richmond County Fair grounds. The view is toward Richmond Road, which runs at the foot of and parallel with the hill, from North Railroad
Avenue.
May 26, 1935
P. L. S.
(2)
A more extensive view in a southwesterly direction.
May 26, 1935
P. L. Sperr
